incident_updates.body: As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Backbone offer. Start time: 05/08/2025 20:00 UTC End time: 06/08/2025 02:00 UTC Service impact: None Service improvement: As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on multiple network equipment located in Paris. Thank you for your understanding.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our vRack Private Network in the room G210. This may temporarily affect availability. scheduled_maintenances.name: [GRA1][Network] - Rooms G108 / G118 vRack Private Network

incident_updates.body: As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our vRack Private Network in the rooms G108 and G118. This may temporarily affect availability. Start time : 06/08/2025 23:59 UTC End time : 07/08/2025 04:00 UTC Service impact : vRack network will be temporarily unavailable. The maintenance may be completed in less time than expected, and we are committed to minimizing the outage duration.
